metdetection.meter.lpcfg

Class MetricalLpcfg

  • java.lang.Object
    • metdetection.meter.lpcfg.MetricalLpcfg
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MetricalLpcfg
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A MetricalLpcfg keeps track of the lexicalized pcfg we've generated with a MetricalLpcfgGenerator.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 29 February, 2016
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
